/usr/bin/c++      CMakeFiles/txt2pcd.dir/txt2pcd.cpp.o  -o txt2pcd  -L/usr/local/lib -rdynamic /usr/local/lib/libpcl_segmentation.so /usr/local/lib/libpcl_surface.so /usr/local/lib/libpcl_recognition.so /usr/local/lib/libpcl_keypoints.so /usr/local/lib/libpcl_stereo.so /usr/local/lib/libpcl_tracking.so -lboost_system -lboost_filesystem -lboost_thread -lboost_date_time -lboost_iostreams -lboost_serialization -lboost_chrono -lboost_atomic -lboost_regex -lpthread -lqhull /usr/local/lib/libflann_cpp.so /usr/local/lib/libpcl_ml.so /usr/local/lib/libpcl_registration.so /usr/local/lib/libpcl_features.so /usr/local/lib/libpcl_io.so /usr/local/lib/libpcl_filters.so /usr/local/lib/libpcl_sample_consensus.so /usr/local/lib/libpcl_search.so /usr/local/lib/libpcl_octree.so /usr/local/lib/libpcl_kdtree.so /usr/local/lib/libpcl_common.so -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib
